Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.cli.strategies.game_mode_strategy.action_strategy

Interface ActionStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
BuildActionStrategy, MoveActionStrategy
public interface ActionStrategy

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean handleBuildAction​(PacketPossibleBuilds packetPossibleBuilds)
    This method is called when a packet with the possible builds is received.
    boolean handleMoveAction​(PacketPossibleMoves packetPossibleMoves)
    This method is called when a packet with the possible moves is received.

  • Method Details

    • handleMoveAction

      boolean handleMoveAction​(PacketPossibleMoves packetPossibleMoves)
      This method is called when a packet with the possible moves is received.
      Parameters:
      packetPossibleMoves - is the object containing the workers' ids and their possible moves.
      Returns:
      true if the entire move restarted, false if another possible move is requested or the move is confirmed by the player.

    • handleBuildAction

      boolean handleBuildAction​(PacketPossibleBuilds packetPossibleBuilds)
      This method is called when a packet with the possible builds is received.
      Parameters:
      packetPossibleBuilds - is the object containing the workers' ids and their possible builds.
      Returns:
      true if the entire build restarted, false if another possible build is requested or the build is confirmed by the player.
